column5: Hi, can anyone who live at St. Catherines or Niagara Region post updates on the weather?  dont want to drive all the way down to find out there is a heavy snow  Thanks!
Weather is bad and expected to get worse. Don't come if you can avoid it.

Just got in - came from Scarborough to St. Catharines - just under 2 hours. It's not as bad as I was expecting, but I sure wouldn't drive it if I didn't have to! Think Sunday will be a good day to spend some quaulity time with the wife - this way she won't complain when I head out ice fishing or snowmobiling!   Don
Hi there,  it is 6:50am Sunday morning how is it now? still bad?
8:00 and ther is a couple of inches of snow on the ground ,wind blowing like crazy though and ice pellets falling, not a good day to be on the road.
Snowing like crazy right now here in the Falls.
thanks for the information, guys  otherwise, i would be stuck in the snow

ya good idea not heading out....about 8-10 inches in Fort Erie for me....shovelled the driveway twice today and will have to do it again soon.  But I love the snow so no big deal...stay at home and have fun.
